Niniejszy dokument określa wysokość nale: This document specifies the amount of fees due to the Administrator from Users related to the provision of Services on the Website or other activities performed by the User or on his behalf as part of using the Website, other than the sale price for the Exchange Service.
Pojęcia użyte w niniejszym dokumencie ma: The terms used in this document have the meaning given to them in the Regulations, unless the content or context of their use indicates otherwise.
Niniejszy dokument ma zastosowanie od mo: This document applies from the moment of its adoption until its amendment or repeal. The User will be notified each time about the change in the content of this document by means of a message displayed on the Website.
Opłata za przesłanie wolumenu Waluty Wir: The fee for sending the volume of Virtual Currency from the Wallet to a virtual wallet external to the Website is depending on the type of Virtual Currency ('Transfer Fee')
Opłata Transferowa w wyżej określonej wy: The Transfer Fee of the specified amount is fixed and does not depend on the Virtual Currency volume to be transferred.
Nie jest dopuszczalne żądanie Użytkownik: The User's request to transfer Virtual Currency to an external virtual wallet is not allowed if the volume of this currency to be transferred is lower than the Transfer Fee due on this account.
Zapłata należnej Opłaty Transferowej nas: The payment of the due Transfer Fee takes place by contractual deduction of the Administrator's and the User's receivables by reducing the transferred volume of Virtual Currency by the amount of this Fee.
Z tytułu wypłaty środków pieniężnych Uży: For the payment of the User's funds for the sale price of the Virtual Currency on the Website to the User's payment account, the Administrator charges the User with a fee of PLN 10.
Wysokość opłaty określonej w ustępie 1 p: The amount of the fee specified above is fixed and independent of the amount of funds paid out.
Zapłata należnej opłaty następuje w drod: The payment of the fee due is made by contractual deduction of the Administrator's and the User's receivables by reducing the amount of transferred funds by the amount of the fee.

Do zakupu kryptowalut potrzebujesz zwery: You need a verified account on the platform to purchase cryptocurrencies. The next step is to select the virtual currency in the panel and enter the amount that we want to spend on the purchase. You can decide to pay for the transaction with a payment card or funds accumulated on the internal wallet. That's all! In a few minutes, the transaction will be confirmed and the purchased cryptocurrencies will immediately affect your wallet!
Do sprzedaży walut wirtualnych potrzebuj: To sell virtual currencies, you need a fully verified account on the platform. Then select the cryptocurrency you are going to exchange. Select a fiat currency from the drop-down list on the right pane. Enter the number of coins exchanged or the amount of money you want to sell cryptocurrencies for. The system will automatically display the most favorable exchange rate. After approving the sale, select the payment method. In a few minutes, the transaction will be confirmed and the funds transferred to your bank account.
Dlaczego jest limit wpłat depozytu maksy: Why is there a deposit limit of up to PLN 8,500?
Działając zgodnie z wytycznymi MIP (źród: Acting in accordance with international guidelines (source
) wprowadzamy dla wszystkich użytkownikó: ), we are introducing a maximum deposit limit of PLN 8,500 for all users. This means that at no time on your account the value of the FIAT currencies (PLN, USD, EUR, GBP) paid to us may exceed a certain limit. Remember that it is only about the value of the deposited funds, there are no limits on the funds held, e.g. from CRYPTO transactions - (USD, EUR, GBP) these funds are kept on a different balance sheet. There is also no credit card purchase limit
Stefan ma wpłacone na bilansie depozytow: John has PLN 8,000 paid on the deposit balance, he wants to pay an additional PLN 2,000 to be able to buy the BTC cryptocurrency for PLN 10,000. The system will prevent such transactions because it exceeds the deposit limit of PLN 8,500.
Stefan posiada na koncie 8000 PLN z wymi: John has PLN 8,000 on his account from the BTC to PLN exchange and wants to deposit PLN 2,000 to be able to buy the BTC cryptocurrency for PLN 10,000. The system will enable the payment because the value of payments made by the transaction on the deposit account is equal to 0.
Kiedy wpłata zostanie dodana do mojego k: When will the deposit be added to my account?
Dokonywanie wpłat kryptowalut oraz depoz: Making cryptocurrency deposits as well as EUR, GBP and USD, PLN deposits by regular bank transfers is free. Information about the time the funds are credited to your account on the website depends on several factors
księgowania wpłat na koncie w naszym ser: posting payments on the account on our website (we book payments on working days 2 times a day)
księgowanie wypłaty z konta w banku wych: the booking of the withdrawal from the account at the outgoing bank depends on the session of that bank and the type of transfer. Remember - an international transfer with currency conversion may take up to several days to be booked.
Wpłaty kryptowalut dopisywane są do kont: Cryptocurrency deposits are added to user accounts after receiving a different number of confirmations from the network - it usually takes a few minutes, it can last up to 30 minutes.
Dlaczego wypłata zmniejsza wartość depoz: Why does a withdrawal reduce my deposit and not my internal wallet balance?
Podczas robienia zakupów Kryptowalut lub: When shopping for Cryptocurrencies or creating a withdrawal of funds from a FIAT wallet (USD, EUR, PLN or GBP), all transactions are made first from the deposit balance and then from the internal balance. The purpose of this procedure is to enable new payments to the deposit account in the future and to act in accordance with international regulations.
Kryptowaluty nazywane są inaczej walutam: Cryptocurrencies are otherwise known as virtual currencies or digital currencies and act as virtual money. They have no material form. Cryptocurrencies are not controlled by governments or central banks, unlike fiat currencies.
Swoją specyfikę w działaniu opiera na sp: Its specificity in operation is based on specialized cryptography. Virtual currencies are used to finance all internet transactions that are characterized by security, speed and transparency. Thanks to cryptography, it is possible to ensure the security of transactions made by users.
Aktualnie odnotowuje się liczbę ponad ty: Currently, there are over a thousand cryptocurrencies, and each of them has a different value. It is worth remembering that the values of virtual currencies are prone to significant fluctuations, and therefore for many people it is not a reliable currency for determining payments. What is Bitcoin?
Jest to pierwsza kryptowaluta, zwana ina: It is the first cryptocurrency, otherwise known as a digital currency, that functions in a decentralized network. Behind his concept is an anonymous person or group of people known under the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto. Bitcoin has no material form and its quantity is limited to 21 million. The purpose of creating Bitcoin was to create an alternative payment system - independent of banks and governments.
Bitcoin nazywany jest „cyfrowym złotem”,: Bitcoin is called 'digital gold', but is it really worth investing in this cryptocurrency? Definitely yes! Bitcoin is not controlled by governments or central banks - it is decentralized. Each network participant can see the register of transactions carried out with the use of this cryptocurrency on the blockchain. The number of Bitcoins is limited to 21 million, therefore the risk of inflation or deflation is lower compared to standard fiat currencies.
Dokonaj zakupu Bitcoina w kantorze onlin: Purchase Bitcoin at the online exchange office of our website or at stationary points supported by our technology. This most popular cryptocurrency can also be purchased on cryptocurrency exchanges, directly from another holder of this virtual currency or by mining cryptocurrency.
Jak zarabiać na Bitcoinie?: How to earn money with Bitcoin?
Wielu początkujących inwestorów zadaje p: Many beginner investors ask the question whether it is really still possible to earn money on this most popular cryptocurrency, Bitcoin. The change in value over time meant that a few years ago investing was profitable, due to the fact that its value was not as high as it is today. Earning on cryptocurrencies is possible when cryptocurrency rates are low and we can count on their growth in a short time.
Warunkiem zarobku na Bitcoinie jest możl: The condition for earning on Bitcoin is the increase in future exchange rates, as well as experience in exchange rate speculation. It is essential to continuously monitor the evolution of Bitcoin to determine its potential future benefits. You can easily make money trading Bitcoin by buying and selling profitably. It is necessary to watch over price changes and decide which exchange rate seems attractive to us to buy. Our profit will be in the case of selling the Cryptocurrency at a higher rate than it was purchased.
Dodatkowo na Bitcoinach można zarobić za: Bitcoin can also be earned through CFDs (contracts for difference), which involve speculating about future changes in value. The profit will depend on the difference between buying and selling.
Społeczność fanów Bitcoina ciągle się po: The Bitcoin fan community is constantly growing! More and more people are interested in investing in this most popular cryptocurrency. However, many potential investors do not know how to start their adventure with investing in Bitcoin.
Do pierwszego zakupu Bitcoina będziesz p: You will only need a fully verified account on our platform to purchase Bitcoin for the first time.
Obserwujemy coraz większe zainteresowani: We are observing a growing interest in investments in this cryptocurrency. Various factors speak for this. People are losing confidence in government or traditional banking. Many potential investors, however, do not know how to start their adventure with investing in Bitcoin. Mastering some of the rules of Bitcoin turns out to be easy.
Dla osób początkujących przydadzą się pe: For beginners, some internet safety tips will be helpful. As the cryptocurrency exists in a virtual form, it is first of all important to ensure the security and reliability of the platforms to which we have access. Any suspicious links or e-mails should immediately raise the belief that there is a suspicion of a fraud or a hacking attack.
Dodatkowo, warto zapoznać się z możliwym: It is worth familiarizing yourself with possible Bitcoin theft attacks, which are often used to manipulate cryptocurrency owners. The basic and necessary point is to devote your own time to learning about what cryptocurrencies really are, and above all - what Bitcoin is and learn about its technical elements of functioning. The next point is the cryptocurrency wallet. Depending on our needs and advancement, we will decide on the best choice of wallet, however, for beginners, a hardware wallet will be perfect, which guarantees high security of our cryptocurrency protection, and is also easy and convenient to use.
